name: Upgrade kafka to 2.0.0.37
body: kafka 2.0.0.37 Contains the revert of passthrough code

name: bump kafka to 2.0.0.35
body: Reverted the passthrough related code

name: bump kafka to 2.0.0.33
Bypass large message processing when passthrough enabled
body: Bypass large message processing in consumer when passthrough(enable.shallow.iterator) is enabled. This is for raw consumer mirroring.

name: Make li kafka producer flush behavior to be the same as open source producer
body:
Make li kafka producer flush behavior to be the same as open source producer in terms of the following:
1. Allow flush after producer.close()
2. Throw original flush exception instead of wrapping it into illegal state exception.

name: bump kafka to 2.0.0.32
body: contains passthrough fix to test passthrough in BMM cert

name: Bump kafka to 2.0.0.29
body: Bump kafka to 2.0.0.29 to pick up oss fix for stale cluster metadata when removing all brokers from one cluster and add the broker(s) to another cluster.

name: Fix race condition in producer dual close
body: Fix race condition in producer dual close called from send callback.

name: Add new LiKafkaConsumerImpl metric - _offsetInvalidOrOutRangeCounter to estimate the potential data loss (#185)
add test and fix bugs of using payload.array()
body:
pick up latest bug fix:
add test and fix bugs of using payload.array()

name: Add enableRecordHeader config in producer
body: This release pulls in the `enableRecordHeader` config in producer that is required for controlling the use of record headers for large message segments.

name: Revert passthrough fix to debug perf issue in BMM
body: Revert passthrough fix that enables passthrough mirroring to work from v1 source to v2 destination, to debug perf issue in BMM since that fix seems to cause regression.

name: Add exception.on.invalid.offset.reset config
body: Add exception.on.invalid.offset.reset config to allow throwing InvalidOffsetException regardless of auto.offset.reset strategy.

name: Empty Commit to trigger new release
body: No new commits, just to trigger a new release to get bintray correctly published.

name: make '_t' record header immutable
body: '_t' should be immutable and not be updated if it is already set

name: consumerOffsetWatermarkSpan metric and header-based large message support
body:
* Added a new consumer metric - consumerOffsetWatermarkSpan to represent "distance between the safe offset and watermark" (#178)
* Introduce new version to process LM segments with record header (#179)

name: Bump mario to 0.0.34
Adds special-headers accessor methods
body:
Migrates from some methods from integration tests to li-apache-kafka-clients jar
Also adds some methods to make use simpler

name: Adding original message size to the large message header value
body: This release adds the original message size to the large message header value. No impact for existing clients.

name: use extended serde interface for sdc testing (#171)
body: This release supports Extended{Serializer,Deserializer} interfaces which supports use of Kafka Record Headers in serialize/deserialize method, example use case include use by shared dictionary compression feature to store dictionary id.

name: Bump kafka to 2.0.0.25 to include fix for KAFKA-8950
body: Bump kafka to 2.0.0.25 to include fix for KAFKA-8950 - KafkaConsumer stops fetching

name: Enable PassThrough mirroring support in clients from V1 (0.10.x) format to V2 (2.x) format
1.0.23: Add record header documentation
Modify the delegate client factory for LiKafkaInstrumented clients to take separate properties for base and override configs
Clients with record header support for timestamp and large message
Add the bounded flush implementation to LiKafkaInstrumentedProducer
Bump up Mario version to 0.0.9
body:
1. Bump up mario version to 0.0.9 to avoid leaking log4j2 bindings to downstream dependencies
2.Support config push at boot up time for federated client.

name: Expose KafkaConsumer API to LiKafkaConsumerImpl
body: `KafkaConsumer` has `poll(long)` and `poll(Duration)`, currently `LiKafkaConsumerImpl` uses `poll(Duration)` only, we would like to expose both methods instead.

name: Add missing methods to kafka-test-harness
body:
Add missing methods from `scala` based kafka-test-harness

```
killBroker(int)
killRandomBroker()
restartDeadBrokers()
```

name: 1.0.4 - Fix in poll() behavior to avoid message loss during consumption
body:
**Symptom**
Current poll() behavior will catch and skip offset on message processing exception and throw the suppressed exception in next poll(). If poll() is not called again and offset is skipped then the user never gets a chance to handle the exception.
All Kafka exceptions are treated as RuntimeException and the message loss can happen if some internal client thread is interrupted which is not a processing exception but an interrupt exception but since its a Kafka exception it is treated as RuntimeException. This caused the offset to move forward without user seing the actual InterruptException and during shutdown if the user commits they will never see the offset that was interrupted.

name: 1.0.3 -  Make topic name accessible in the MessageSplitterImpl (#102)
body: A simple bugfix that will make topicName accessible to the `SegmentSerializer`.

name: 1.0.2 - Pull in Kafka 2.0 clients (#100) (#101)
body:
The following changes have been made in addition to bumping up the Kafka version to pull in:

* LiKafkaConsumerImpl implements new methods in the KafkaConsumer API, including ones that introduce timeouts for existing operations like position, committed, etc.
* org.apache.kafka.common.protocol.Security is under the package, org.apache.kafka.common.security.auth, in 2.0
* Redundant API declarations in LiKafkaProducer and LiKafkaConsumer have been removed.

name: 0.0.17 - Porting fixes from internal branch (PR #99)
body: 0.0.17 - Porting fixes from internal branch ( For more details, see PR #99 )
